wikipedia_page.main: Charles Brian Hegarty (born  (1950-11-29) 29 November 1950 in Hawick, Scotland) is a Scottish former rugby union footballer of the 1970s.He was capped four times in 1978 for Scotland. He also played for Hawick RFC.He is the son of John Hegarty, who was also capped for Scotland.

response: He was the father of Brian Hegarty, who was also capped for Scotland.
